name: Boys Craft: Wasteland
description:
From the makers of Girls Craft, game for everyone!
Wasteland opens new superhero adventure across a vast desert. A variety of biomes are waiting for you - explore the mines and caves, get new friends - from superheroes with superabilities to cute princesses including Elsa, Rapunzel, Jasmine and many other interesting characters!

The unique system of selecting characters (for boys and girls), a variety of maps, search for resources and craft items to create different buildings, survival and much more!

Three game modes: classic, creative and new mode "Township", where you can continue development and building your own city, which inhabited by different characters, communicate with townspeople, build your own houses, fortresses, shops, cafe or other creative buildings.

- Completely free game for kids and adults.
- New biome - Wasteland.
- A large set of choice of interior and furniture.
- Two texture packs and new blocks.
- Explore the mine, mining treasures and make new friends.
- Mobile edition includes new maps and characters inhabiting this world!
